meanings.definition: Not able to be resolved or settled
meanings.sent1: The conflict between the two friends was irresolvable.
meanings.sent2: The issue was irresolvable, causing tension in the group.
meanings.sent3: The irresolvable puzzle left the children scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: The irresolvable debate echoed through the halls of the school.
meanings.sent5: The irresolvable problem seemed to grow bigger with each attempt to solve it.

meanings.definition: Unable to be solved or fixed
meanings.sent1: The mystery was irresolvable, leaving everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The technical glitch was irresolvable despite multiple attempts.
meanings.sent3: The irresolvable leak in the roof dripped water on the cat, much to its annoyance.
meanings.sent4: The irresolvable knot in the rope symbolized their unbreakable bond.
meanings.sent5: The irresolvable conflict between the two nations seemed to have no end in sight.
